overview:
Dilek DAYINLARLI is a Vice President at 212, focusing on investments in Internet, telecom and technology companies.

Prior to 212, Dilek worked at Groupon as a Director of Strategy and Analysis where she advised senior management on current performance and future strategies, led company growth through new product category launches, transferred international best practices, and worked with the sales organization to become more effective. Previously, Dilek was a Senior Management Consultant in Accenture’s Communications & High Technology practice, involved in identifying and analyzing new investment opportunities in the Internet and telecom sectors, undertaking market entry, due diligence and operations improvement projects. Dilek spent the first couple of years of her career in Turkey as a Business Developer at Koc Holding’s Telecom division executing business development and strategy. She started her career in the USA, where she held different project management positions and also created her own start-up.

Dilek received her BS in Mechanical Engineering from Yildiz Technical University and a Master of Business Administration in Strategy from Johnson & Wales University.
